message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $110. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something a bit closer to my original asking price.  Would you consider $105?
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer, but I'm still unable to meet you at $105. I would like to propose $100 for the product.
